snippet: The fungus causes white-nose syndrome, a disease that has killed more than 5.5 million bats in North America since being discovered in a cave in upstate New York in 2006.
abstract: The fungus causes white-nose syndrome, a disease that has killed more than 5.5 million bats in North America since being discovered in a cave in upstate New York in 2006.

headline.main: Devastating Bat Fungus Invades From Europe
